titleStmt.title: At the court at Whitehall, the 26th of March 1672. Mr. Secretary Trevor..
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1660-1685 : Charles II)
Charles II, King of England, 1630-1685.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by the Assigns of John Bill and Christopher Barker, Printers to the Kings most Excellent Majesty,

notesStmt.note: On the petition of the Rulers and Overseers of the Company of Watermen, the Order in Council, 8 Feb. 1627, was renewed and confirmed, freeing them from being pressed or billeted.
Initial; Steele notation: Arms 75 the whereunto yield.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
